data.name: Cacnea

attacks.name: Swagger
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard an Energy attached to your opponent's Active Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

data.name: Cacnea

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive for 30 days without water.

data.name: Cacnea

attacks.name: Sucker Punch
attacks.text: If this Pokémon has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 30 more damage.

data.flavorText: It lives in arid locations. Its yellow flowers bloom once a year.

attacks.name: Sand Attack
attacks.text: If the Defending Pokémon tries to attack during your opponent's next turn, your opponent flips a coin. If tails, that attack does nothing.

data.name: Cacnea

abilities.name: Poison Payback
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.flavorText: It prefers harsh environments such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.

data.name: Team Aqua's Cacnea
rules: This Pokémon is both Grass Darkness type.

attacks.name: Paralyzing Gaze
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Pin Missile
attacks.text: Flip 4 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Spike Cannon
attacks.text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage times the number of heads.

attacks.name: Call for Family
attacks.text: Search your deck for a Basic Pokémon and put it onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

attacks.name: Rising Lunge
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 10 damage plus 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Feint Attack
attacks.text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon. This attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness, Resistance, Poké-Powers, Poké-Bodies, or any other effects on that Pokémon.

abilities.name: Poison Payback
abilities.text: If Cacnea is your Active Pokémon and is damaged by an opponent's attack (even if Cacnea is Knocked Out), the Attacking Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Poison Sting
attacks.text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Poisoned.

data.name: Cacnea

attacks.name: Sneaky Attack
attacks.text: If Cacnea has any Darkness Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

attacks.name: Shoot Needle
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. For each heads, choose 1 of your opponent's Pokémon and this attack does 10 damage to that Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can choose the same Pokémon more than once, but you can't do more than 10 damage to that Pokémon in this way.)

data.flavorText: By storing water in its body, this desert dweller can survive 30 days without water.

data.name: Cacnea

abilities.name: Counterattack Quills
abilities.text: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokémon (even if this Pokémon is Knocked Out), put 3 damage counters on the Attacking Pokémon.

data.flavorText: It prefers harsh environments, such as deserts. It can survive for 30 days on water stored in its body.
